CLUE: Instrument for viewing at a distance
FOUND IN: Telescope - An instrument with an arrangement of lenses or mirrors to observe distant objects by collecting electromagnetic radiation, especially in the visible spectrum.
Subpoena - A writ ordering someone to attend and testify in court or produce documents.
Ollie Hardy - The second half of the Laurel and Hardy duo, known for his more relaxed and amiable personality compared to Stan Laurel's portrayal as an optimistic character.
Invisible - impossible to see with the naked eye.
Ure - A long tributary of the River Skell, located in North Yorkshire.
